about_the_game:
Feast your ears on the soundtrack that started it all! Featuring the inimitable talents of Steve McRae, witness the ultimate in pinball chiptunes that are in games with steampunk aesthetics made by the person writing this paragraph! Seriously though, this is the soundtrack for the game. All proceeds go directly to composer.

Tracks

All tracks are provided in ".mp3" format.

  • 01 - ( 1:36 ) - theme of a pinball game
  • 02 - ( 2:40 ) - a fine day for pinball
  • 03 - ( 2:29 ) - wherein things get serious
  • 04 - ( 0:44 ) - denouement
  • 05 - ( 0:05 ) - better luck next time
  • 06 - ( 1:09 ) - hall of infamy
  • 07 - ( 1:46 ) - triumphancy
  • 08 - ( 1:36 ) - a night at the opera
  • 09 - ( 1:23 ) - duck soup
  • 10 - ( 2:36 ) - bonus track!

legal_notice: The Super Steampunk Pinball 2D original soundtrack is © 2017 by Steve McRae.  All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You Betcha

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yup

name: Super Steampunk Pinball 2D - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Original Soundtrack for Super Steampunk Pinball 2D
